Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh struck thrice while Kuldeep Yadav snapped two wickets as India beat Australia by 24 runs
Travis Head hit a walk-off grand slam in the ninth inning
Jasprit Bumrah got rid of Travis Head to set up a win for India
Rohit Sharma scored 92 off just 41 balls
Pre-Game Insights: India needs to beat Australia or avoid a heavy defeat to secure qualification
Australia needs a win over India to stay in contention for the semifinals
If Australia lose, Afghanistan will need to beat Bangladesh to advance
Australia's chances are slim given their recent performances and losses
India's seamers and spinners are in good form
The match will be streamed on the Hotstar App and telecast on the Star Sports Network
There is a good chance of rain in St Lucia, but it is unlikely the match will get washed out
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather conditions affected the match, with heavy showers expected
India posted a total of 205/5 against Australia
Australia now depend on Bangladesh to do them a favor in the final Super-8 game against Afghanistan
The match was held at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, St Lucia
